Please provide the GovAG FY 2025 Financial Statements audit road map and the related planned actions for WCF.
Please provide the GovAG FY 2025 CAP Timeline for WCF

Please provide the following in regards to Entity Wide Controls:
•            The most recent GovAG Code of Conduct
•            The most recent communication of agency-wide goals and strategic plans
•            Policy or evidence demonstrating GovAG leadership and employees have read and understood the GovAG Code of Conduct and other Federal Ethical Guidelines
•            Guidance provided to GovAG's General Counsel to determine conflicts of interest reported to them. 
•            Guidance of disciplinary actions for GovAG employees who violate GovAG and Federal ethical rules  
•            Stewardship Committee/Audit Committee Meeting Minutes and Slides for FY25 Q1. If a Stewardship/Audit Committee meeting did not take place, provide meeting minutes from any GovAG Audit Task Force (ATF) meetings held during Q1.

Please provide GovAG management's conclusions regarding GovAG WCF's ability to continue as a going concern, as well as any policies and procedures related to the going concern basis of accounting. If GovAG has not implemented any policies and procedures or concluded on GovAG WCF's ability to continue as a going concern in FY 2025, please provide explanation for this via Memorandum for Record (MFR).

Please provide GovAG management's assessment of and conclusions on cash adequacy in the GovAG WCF, as well as any policies and procedures related to the assessment of cash adequacy. If GovAG has not implemented any policies and procedures or concluded on GovAG WCF's cash adequacy in FY 2025, please provide explanation for this via Memorandum for Record (MFR).

Please provide a complete listing of the laws and regulations that are applicable to GovAG, including whether each law and regulation is direct (or indirect) and/or material. 
Additionally, please provide a complete listing of all known or allegation instances of GovAG non-compliances with the listed laws and regulations.

Please provide a complete detailed listing of all litigation and/or any other contingent legal liabilities along with management's schedule over the likelihood (probable, reasonably possible, and remote) and estimated cost of an unfavorable outcome for each potential liability. 
Each item on the listing should identify the type of case (i.e. 1) Equal Employment Opportunity Act (EEOC), 2) Armed Services Board of Contract Appeals (ASBCA), 3) Grievance – Arbitration, 4) Merit System Protection Board (MSPB) 5) Federal Court (for all MSCs), etc. The listing should also include the case name, case description, an external case reference identifier number (i.e. ASBCA #), and an estimate of the minimum and maximum liability. 

Please provide screenshots of the parameters used to generate the report

Please refer to the attached tracker ("GEN-015 FY25 Listing of GovAG SOPs") containing a list of the most current GovAg SOPs and other policies and procedures in Auditor's possession. For each policy document listed, please provide the following:
1. Confirm whether Auditor has the most updated version. If not, please provide the current version under this request.
2. Confirm whether any documents listed are no longer in use by GovAg and/or have been superseded. If the latter, please provide the new policy document.
3. Provide the current version of any additional documents Auditor requested (listed in tracker as "GovAg to provide current version").
4. If GovAg plans to make updates to the policy during FY 2025, provide the expected date of completion.
